includedAssets.title: The Beginning of the End

includedAssets.synopsis: First episode of an action-packed fourth season. How did Jack and Kate get off the island? Who is on the boat?

includedAssets.title: The Economist
includedAssets.synopsis: In a Sayid-centric episode, the former Iraqi Republican Guard teams up with Kate to negotiate the release of the valuable hostage held by Locke.

includedAssets.title: Eggtown
includedAssets.synopsis: A Kate-centric episode sees her make a decision which affects her relationship with Sawyer, as she attempts to extract information from the hostage.

includedAssets.title: The Constant
includedAssets.synopsis: On their way to the mysterious freighter, Desmond and Sayid experience some turbulence, causing the Scot to have unexpected side-effects.

includedAssets.title: The Other Woman

includedAssets.title: Ji Yeon

includedIn.title: Lost
includedIn.synopsis: After a plane crash, a group of survivors must learn to live on a mysterious island, while coping with the shadowy dangers of their new home and desperately searching for a way back to civilisation.
